title: [FEATURE] Access RAW image pixels
body:
### Is your feature request related to a problem?

I would like to access to raw pixels of a DNG image (before debayering and post processing), is this already possible?

### Describe the solution you would like

I would like to see an example able to access raw pixels of a DNG image

### Describe alternatives you have considered

There aren't easy alternatives

### Additional context

_No response_

### Code of Conduct

- [x] I agree to follow this project's Code of Conduct
